channel.title: Hardcore is now fully possible in Auxy
channel.description:
I was messing around with the new stuff on Auxy, and it’s become complicated yet simple to make new sounds. I was trying to make another new ***a e s t h e t i c*** song when suddenly turning bitcrusher to the following settings for the Dust kick gave me this:
https://app.auxy.co/projects/vLTaq-Loey9rXNFR0T4sgg==
Edit: It turns out **anything** can be a hardcore kick.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/8aFV0Igw9GCULddfmnLhLQ==
